mapper.select: SELECT * FROM RESTAURANT ORDER BY LIKECNT, STARCNT DESC
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM RESTAURANT WHERE STARCNT >= 4) ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE) WHERE ROWNUM <= 8
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM RESTAURANT WHERE RS_CATEGORY = #{category} ORDER BY LIKECNT, STARCNT DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 8
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM RESTAURANT WHERE RS_GU = #{address} ORDER BY LIKECNT, STARCNT DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 8
SELECT * FROM RESTAURANT WHERE RS_NAME LIKE '%'||#{word}||'%' OR RS_GU LIKE '%'||#{word}||'%'
SELECT RS_NAME "RESTAURANT_NAME", LIKECNT FROM RESTAURANT WHERE ROWNUM <= 10 ORDER BY LIKECNT DESC
SELECT RS_CATEGORY "CATEGORY", SUM(LIKECNT) LIKECNT FROM RESTAURANT GROUP BY RS_CATEGORY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESERVATION (user_id, rs_code,nickname, RES_DATE,res_time, buyAble ) values(#{userId}, #{rsCode}, #{nickname}, TO_DATE(#{resDate},'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{resTime}, #{buyAble})
mapper.select: SELECT R.USER_ID, R.NICKNAME, R2.RS_CODE, R2.RS_NAME, R.RES_DATE, R.RES_TIME FROM RESERVATION R LEFT JOIN RESTAURANT R2 ON R.RS_CODE = R2.RS_CODE
